entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.OpenAPI 2.0.0.0 has breaking changes #61123
  • Automatically describe as an Open API 'string' types that implement TryParse instead of as 'object' #61122
  • Perf regression: json, json, single_query #61120
  • PaginationState needs to have public methods to set the object as it can then be used with custom components. #61124
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #61093
  • 502 Bad Gateway when running integration tests #61091

Closed

  • Add an interface for BindAsync #61121
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #61088
  • Perf regression: updates #61078
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #61092
  • Limit memory pool size #61063

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add CurrentLtsTargetFramework only when it's not present #61076
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ClientCascade more performant alternative (Source Generator library) #35831
  • Easy way to work with custom nested transactions #35830

Closed

  • IQueryable Concat throws "Unable to translate set operation after client projection has been applied" EF Core 8.0.2 #35828

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix AdHocJsonQueryCosmosTest on CI #35827

Updated

  • Support accessing members of a conditional value #35390
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android application crashes without debugger #28575
  • [Test] Write test for [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28572
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [9.0 Android] DialogFragment.Dialog.KeyPress event requires DialogEventArgs.IsHandled to be set to false, or else keyboard malfunctions #28571
  • Setting BackButtonBehavior to not visible or not enabled does not work #28570
  • GetManifestResourceStream doesn't work when project name is different than RootNamespace #28569

Closed

  • System.MissingMethodException: 'Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Internals.PropertyPropagationExtensions.PropagatePropertyChanged(string,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element,System.Collections.IEnumerable)' #28450
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [9.0 Android] External keyboard does not work on modal pages (works in Xamarin) #27821
    Backlog
  • Custom handler error on iOS - The type 'MyMauiControl.Handlers.CustomEntryHandler' cannot be used as type parameter 'TViewHandler' in the generic type or method 'PropertyMapper<TVirtualView, TViewHandler>'. #28433

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28574
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal

Merged

  • [iOS] Changing carousel view orientation with disabled loop - fix #28545
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [XC] better support for nullable props and BPs #28550
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [inflight/current] System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28573
  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456
    area-xaml, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • [2025/03/24] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - UI Test #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Disabled animation for NavigationBar on initial display #27080
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Update the comment for the test properties #27306
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Improve VisualState order and prevent sticky Focused visual state #27477
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28485
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fix App freezes when Background property is set to OnPlatform Color DynamicResource #27444
    t/bug, area-drawing, .NET 9 SR7
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in BindableLayout - Fix #26777
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28553
    area-templates
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Gradient background with ImageButton #26297
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Child Span font attributes inheritance #26197
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    do-not-merge, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Fixed removing items from grouped list #26082
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [iOS] Fixed memory leak with PopToRootAsync when using TitleView #28547
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28554
    area-templates
  • Implements `SecureStorage.GetOrSetAsync(key, value?)` (for #27966) #28565
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider, .NET 9 SR6

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Stop using the rename dashboard" #77770
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Move the construction cost of SettingsEditorFactory to when it's used #77754
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unseal a method that TS has IVT to and overrides #77767
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' => 'release/dev18.0' #77772
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'release/dev17.15-vs-deps' #77771
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Allow modification of source generated documents #77587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix handling of partial definition deletes #77735
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intermittent test crash on linux arm64 #113810
  • JIT: Missed `i >= 0` assertion #113809
  • PollGC rewrite and TS_CatchAtSafePoint #113807
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Unexpected and undocumented (performance) pitfall in BufferedStream.WriteByte #104559
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enable TransactionManager.ImplicitDistributedTransactions for All Platforms #113805

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP #113812
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable FEATURE_STUBPRECODE_DYNAMIC_HELPERS #113811
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: remove single-def restriction from escape analysis type refinement #113808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [apphost] [Windows] Fix open_url and try_show_error_with_task_dialog under AppContainer #113804
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 134.0.6998.166 #113802
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Move JIT_InitPInvokeFrame implementation to assembler on x86 and ARM32 #113791
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow embeded ICU data with StaticICULinking #113761
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ms:format-date and ms:format-time test cases #113507
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Optimize compression of embedded PDB file. #113803
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #113801
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO

Updated

  • Expand "return condition" into "return condition ? true : false" #107499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Remove all explicit GC Poll calls in unmanaged code. #113715
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix break in DirectoryServices SearchResultCollection #113775
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Implement `AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata`. #111642
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Detect Zba & Zbb extensions #113676
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Binary writer fix #107369
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` & fix a edge case of `TryParse` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add DivRem with DivisionRounding (WIP + Review request) #104589
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono] Fix for issue 109410 #113740
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove bounds checks for Log2 function in FormattingHelpers.CountDigits #113790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, reduce-unsafe
  • Disallow loading non-Explicit types with explicit field offsets #113500
    breaking-change, area-VM-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet Runtime 9 not clean from registry when unistalling it #47820

Closed

  • dotnet build fails if cwd contains a colon (macOS) #10129
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898

  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800

  • Removes LINQ usage and optimizes JSON serialization further #47810
